title: Test

summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 13 data points.
Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly increasing from 2006 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2016, gradually increasing from 2016 to 2018, and lastly roughly decreasing from 2018 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2018.
Max Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 199.1 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 62.82 was recorded at Year 2006
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly constant which exists from 2013 to 2016.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly constant which exists from 2008 to 2011.
But, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2016 to 2019.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly constant which exists from 2011 to 2013.
Differently, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2006 to 2008.
